scripts.build:development: STAGE=development eas build --profile development --platform all && say done
scripts.build:development:ios: STAGE=development eas build --profile development --platform ios && say done
scripts.build:development:android: STAGE=development eas build --profile development --platform android && say done
scripts.build:preview: STAGE=staging eas build --profile preview --platform all && say done
scripts.build:preview:ios: STAGE=staging eas build --profile preview --platform ios && say done
scripts.build:preview:android: STAGE=staging eas build --profile preview --platform android && say done
scripts.build:production: STAGE=production eas build --profile production --platform all && say done
scripts.build:production:ios: STAGE=production eas build --profile production --platform ios && say done
scripts.build:production:android: STAGE=production eas build --profile production --platform android && say done
scripts.build:simulator: STAGE=staging eas build --profile simulator --platform ios && say done
